onyomiExamples.meaning: seat, place, position, status, gathering, party, company, atmosphere (of a gathering), stand, pedestal, platform, (historical) trade guild, attaches to the names of constellations, attaches to the names of theatres, cinemas and theatrical troupes, counter for theatres, deities, Buddhist images, tall mountains, and satokagura songs
tatami room, tatami mat room, formal Japanese room, dinner party in a tatami room (esp. when a geisha or maiko attends)
implication (in a crime), involvement, sitting in a row (in the same seat)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to sit, to squat, to assume (a position), to hold steady, to hold still
